verbose_text: Reineri et al. subsequently introduced the PHIP-SAH approach (PHIP by side arm hydrogenation), which allows the transfer of proton polarization from a hydrogenated sidearm to a 13 C nucleus of a metabolite.31 Cleavage of the precursor molecule leads to hyperpolarized metabolites.
evidence: PHIP by side arm hydrogenation), which allows the transfer of proton
